caption.p: Coefficient of Variation for ( a) Maize ( b) Irrigated maize ( c) Non-irrigated maize ( d) Sorghum ( e) Irrigated sorghum ( f) Non-irrigated sorghum ( g) Soybean ( h) Irrigated soybean; ( i) Non-irrigated soybean yields in the Great Plains counties over the period 1968â€“2013. Only those counties were shown which had at least 50% of the total data records. We created the maps using ESRI ArcMap 10.4.1 software http://desktop.arcgis.com/en/arcmap/.
